name: Vulpine Pounce
enabledFormula: "Swift Kitsune Shapechanger, base attack bonus +10, kitsune."

description.text: You can change shape mid-charge and pounce on an opponent in the same round.

sections.Benefit: When you change shape into your kitsune form and use the charge action in the same round, you can make a full attack against your opponent.
sections.Special: A kitsune may select this feat any time she would gain a feat.
